# Bayes Theorem {.section}

## Bayes rule

$$\large P(A\mid B) = \frac{P(B \mid A) P(A)}{P(B)}$$



$$\large P(H \mid D) = \frac{P(D \mid H) \times P(H)}{P(D)}$$
